item.content:encoded:
Funny Pun Happy Mummys Day Mother’s Day Card

Hot Deals! Funny Pun Happy Mummys Day Mother’s Day Card – Mothers Day Cards Funny Pun Happy Mummys Day Mother’s Day Card products with good quality, you can be confident Funny Pun Happy Mummys Day Mother’s Day Card Try to read more firstWe all owe so much to our Moms, so it is great that they have their own special day to be celebrated. One year my two brothers and I scheduled a mid-May golf trip to treat our golf-nut Dad to a special weekend. None of us realized (until it was too late to cancel) that we had accidently chosen Mother’s Day weekend. We have never been able to live that one down with the four mothers involved, but our Dad sure did have a great Mother’s Day weekend! Please enjoy this funny pun Happy Mother’s Day card! Price:$4.17
